task.title: How to Make Sunshine Cinnamon Nut Quinoa
task.shortdesc: This Sunshine Cinnamon Nut Quinoa recipe takes a twist on the classic oatmeal. It's sweet, healthy, and indulging. The recipe makes 4 servings

step.cmd: In a medium saucepan on high heat, combine the quinoa, water, and milk and bring it to a boil
In a medium saucepan on high heat, combine the quinoa, water, and almond milk and bring it to a boil.
Once the ingredients are boiling, reduce the heat to medium-low and cover the saucepan.
Let the ingredients simmer for 15 minutes until the liquid is absorbed into the quinoa.
After 15 minutes or so, turn off the heat and let the ingredients cool off for 5 minutes.
Turn on another stove plate to medium heat.
Using a dry skillet, roast the almonds for 2 to 3 minutes. Add in cinnamon while roasting.
Once the quinoa and almonds are ready, you may transfer them into 4 bowls.
Add the blueberries, agave nectar, and extra almonds over your quinoa as you desire.
